Override Generic Dialogue.Description: Overwrites the bouquet acceptance dialogue. Please turn this off if you do not plan on dating Chrissy.

Entries.Chrissy.Seanie: This is incredible! I wanna slurp yah! $6/-5 305 272 306 307 308 807/Wow, you're actually not a complete moron. This is pretty neat. $1//This is cringe. $2//This reminds me of the time my little brother drank a candle, are you as thick as him? $2/-4/I AM THE LORD OF DARKNESS. $8//

Entries.ChrissyMail.SecretWoods: Hi @,^I want to explain everything, so please meet me in the secret forest at noon. I promise I'm a good person.^^Thanks.^-Chrissy[#]Meet Me in the Woods
Entries.ChrissyMail.Picnic: Hey @,^Next Tuesday, come to the Cindersnap Forest. I want to do something special for all that you've done for me.^^And don't forget to bring your juicy bottom.^^-Chrissy[#]@.
Entries.ChrissyMail.MagicShow: Dear @,^Tomorrow I've decided to host a magic show in town, and everyone is invited. It would mean the world to me if you came.^I cannot wait to see you.^^You know what I mean. Don't make me say it to your face, you moron.^^-Chrissy[#]You better be there!

Entries.NPC.cs.3962: Really @? $4#$b# I've felt this way since the day I met you $4#$b# I thought my chances were over when we became best friends.$4#$e# I'm so giddy...I feel like such a moron $4#$e# Go away! I'm too embarrassed to talk to you right now, you moron. $4
Entries.NPC.cs.3963: Really @? $4#$b# I've felt this way since the day I met you $4#$b# I thought my chances were over when we became best friends.$4#$e# I'm so giddy...I feel like such a moron $4#$e# Go away! I'm too embarrassed to talk to you right now, you moron. $4
Entries.NPC.cs.3980: Ar- Are you serious @?‚Äù $1#$b# Of course, I'll marry you! $1

Entries.Chrissy.Seanie0: MARRIAGE IS AWESOME. I CANNOT WAIT. $4#$e# FOREVER LOVE.$1
Entries.Chrissy.Seanie1: I seriously can't believe I'm so lucky. $4#$e# Back on my home planet, we don't do weddings, so I never thought this would happen to me! $4

Entries.Chrissy.Seanie: I love rainy days. $1#$e# Just the sound of the drops hitting the window soothes me. $1#$b# I'm not going soft, I just like the sky water! $4

Entries.Sun6: I hope I can talk to my uncle again soon. $3
Entries.Mon6: Things have been really awkward back at my house lately. $2

Entries.Chrissy.Seanie: I love rainy days almost as much as I love you $1

Entries.1116012/f Chrissy.Seanie 500/d Mon Wed T: continue/-1000 -1000/farmer 70 37 2 Chrissy.Seanie 70 46 2/skippable/specificTemporarySprite pennyFieldTrip/showframe Chrissy.Seanie 16/fade/viewport 70 45 true/move farmer 0 5 2/stopMusic/emote Chrissy.Seanie 56/playMusic poppy/speak Chrissy.Seanie "It's a Sunny Day, $8 #$b#I hope it stays that Way, $8#$b#My hair's just a little gray, $8 #$b#I just got a raise, $8 #$b#And I'm deserving of some praise, $8 #$b#So today we eat some mayonnaise, $8"/animate Chrissy.Seanie false false 200 16 17 18 19 18 19 18 19 18/playSound gulp/message "Chrissy.Seanie brings the jar of mayonnaise to her mouth, and chugs it, in one gulp!"/showframe Chrissy.Seanie 0/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Mayonnaise Monday, $8#$b#It's Mayonnaise Monday! $8"/message "Chrissy.Seanie grabs a second jar of mayonnaise"/showframe Chrissy.Seanie 16/stopMusic/question fork0 "What should you do?#I can't let this go on any longer.#I'll just leave her alone.#"/fork MayoTime/move farmer -12 0 1/end warpOut/
Entries.MayoTime: move farmer 0 3 2/faceDirection Chrissy.Seanie 0/speak Chrissy.Seanie "@, what are you doing here?$2#$b#I swear, it's not what it looks like. This isn't a normal thing I do. $3#$b# It- It's a family tradition. I- I know it's a little weird, but my brother started it when we were kids. When I miss him, I have my Mayonnaise Mondays.$3"/question fork1 "You don't think it's weird right?#I get it. I miss my family sometimes too.#I'm not sure I can be your friend anymore.#"/fork MayoTime2/speak Chrissy.Seanie "I completely understand. $3"/friendship Chrissy.Seanie -20/move farmer 0 -12 0 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.MayoTime2: friendship Chrissy.Seanie 50/playMusic ragtime/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Really? I knew you were cool @.$1#$b# Please just don't tell anybody about this?$4#$b#Especially not Uncle Lew.$7#$b# I'm glad it was someone like you who found me. $7"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Mayonnaise Monday.$8"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Chrissy.Seanie "Thanks for keeping my secret $1#$b# I owe you one. $6#$b#I'll see if I can find any 'additional tax write offs' for you this spring."

I knew you were cool @.$1#$b# Please just don't tell anybody about this?$4#$b#Especially not Uncle Lew.$7#$b# I'm glad it was someone like you who found me. $7"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Mayonnaise Monday.$8"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Chrissy.Seanie "Thanks for keeping my secret $1#$b# I owe you one. $6#$b# I'll see if I can find any 'additional tax write offs' for you this spring."

Entries.1769801/f Chrissy.Seanie 1000/t 900 2100: continue/42 72/farmer 35 73 3 Chrissy.Seanie 43 72 0 Vincent 42 72 1/skippable/pause 1500/speak Vincent "Hey lady, I'm bored. $0"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Good to know. $2"/speak Vincent "Can you do something funny? $0"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Why don't you ask your burnout brother? $2"/speak Vincent "C'mon pleeeeeeease. $3"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "No. $2"/speak Vincent "Pleeeeeeeease?"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "OKAY FINE! $5"/stopMusic/faceDirection Chrissy.Seanie 3/move farmer 7 0 0 true/pause 500/emote farmer 8/waitForAllStationary/pause 800/playSound newRecipe/message "Chrissy begins shuffling cards"/playMusic playful/speak Vincent "What are you doing? $3"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "I'm gonna do a magic trick. $2#$b# Pick a card from the top of the deck."/playSound pickUpItem/message "Vincent picks a card and stares at it."/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Okay, memorize that card."/speak Vincent "Right!"/emote Vincent 16/pause 400/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Okay, got it? Now put it back in the deck wherever you want."/playSound dwop/message "Vincent puts the card back."/message "Chrissy.Seanie proceeds to shuffle the deck several times, and then throws whole the deck of cards onto the floor."/playSound dwoop/message "She holds one up."/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Was this your card? $1"/stopMusic/emote Vincent 40/pause 400/speak Vincent "I don't remember."/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Of course you don't... $2"/speak Vincent "That was fun, thank you miss!"/speed Vincent 3/move Vincent -12 0 1 true/pause 2000/advancedMove farmer false 0 -1/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Chrissy.Seanie "$q 6699 null "#You look at the card Chrissy was holding. You notice it was not his card, what do you say?#$r 66 0 event_MagicTruth#That‚Äôs not his card...#$r 6699 40 event_MagicLie#*lie* ‚ÄúWow! You got it, that‚Äôs pretty cool."/playMusic springtown/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Let me try it again, I KNOW I‚Äôll get it right this time. You don‚Äôt mind staying right?"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/end

Entries.1769802/f Chrissy.Seanie 1500: shaneTheme/6 7/farmer -100 -100 0 Lewis 5 5 1 Chrissy.Seanie 7 5 3/addConversationTopic Chrissy6HWait 0/skippable/pause 1500/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 4 11 0/speak Lewis "CJ, I‚Äôve looked over this paperwork, THREE times now. $2#$b# Something isn‚Äôt adding up. $3"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Uncle Lew, I told you not to call me that anymore.$2"/speak Lewis "Sorry, Chrissy.$5#$b# But something isn‚Äôt adding up here.$2#$b# I thought you put all that behind you.$2"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "I did! I promise.$2"/speak Lewis "You said you were going to be taking this seriously. $4#$b# But it seems like you‚Äôre just back to your old ways."/speak Chrissy.Seanie "I‚Äôm not, I promise! $3#$b# Why can‚Äôt you trust me on this?"/speak Lewis "Do you know how risky it was for the MAYOR of Pelican Town to take in someone on the run from the feds? $3"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Oh, you LOVE to just throw that in my face Uncle Lew. $2#$b# What am I supposed to do? UNcommit tax fraud? $5"/speak Lewis "Well, you could at least take your job a bit more seriously. $3"/speak Chrissy.Seanie " I take it more seriously than you! $5#$b# You‚Äôre the one always taking 2 hour lunch breaks at the ranch!"/speak Lewis "What I do in my personal time is NONE of your concern! $3"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Well is it my concern that you‚Äôre a sad, old man, who won‚Äôt even commit to the one person in his life that cares about him? $7#$b# All for what? To be the mayor of some broken down town? $7#$b# The town is in shambles anyway.$7#$b# I heard that Pierre is thinking of moving his business to Grampleton."/speak Lewis "What? Is that true? $4"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "How would you know? You know nothing about your own town. $6#$b# You‚Äôre a fraud of a mayor."/faceDirection Lewis 3/pause 1000/speak Lewis "Maybe your tax evasion case isn‚Äôt the ONLY reason your family doesn‚Äôt talk to you anymore, CJ. $3"/move Lewis 0 6 2/speak Lewis "Sorry you had to see that, @. $2"/playSound doorClose/warp Lewis 1000 1000/faceDirection Chrissy.Seanie 2/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Would you just get out of here? $5#$b# This is none of your business."/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 200/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 1000 1000/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end warpOut

Entries.1769803/f Chrissy.Seanie 1500/A Chrissy6: continue/-10000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 2 Chrissy.Seanie 64 17 0/skippable/warp farmer -100 -100/viewport 64 15 clamp true/pause 2000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 64 15/pause 400/emote farmer 8/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Sorry you had to see that the other day $5#$b# My uncle was being so mean to me. $3#$b# Maybe I was a bit out of line too. $3#$b# I know I have a lot of explaining to do as your friend.$3#$b# If you can still consider me one. $3#$b# Just give me a little time. $1#$b# Welp, see you around!"/end

Entries.1769804/f Chrissy.Seanie 1500/n ChrissyM: continue/26 9/farmer 28 13 0 Chrissy.Seanie 25 9 1/skippable/pause 300/move farmer 0 -4 0/move farmer -2 0 3/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Hey @. $3#$b# Thanks for coming out today.$6"/stopMusic/speak Chrissy.Seanie "I just wanted the opportunity to explain everything to you. $3#$b# Because believe it or not, you might just be my best friend in the valley. $4"/playMusic desolate/speak Chrissy.Seanie "What you heard in my Uncle‚Äôs house the other day wasn‚Äôt a lie. $3#$b# I am on the run from the feds for tax evasion.$3#$b# You see the thing is... $3#$b# Tax evasion is actually really cool and based. $4#$b# I used to work for a prominent accounting firm in Zuzu City. $3#$b# And I realized if I just... didn‚Äôt pay my taxes...$3#$b# Then that would mean I would have more money. $1#$b# And if had more money, I could get more magic tricks. $7#$b# After that, I had to do the greatest magic trick of all...$3#$b# Vehicular Manslaughter."/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Just kidding, you knew what I meant. $7"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Now my whole family won‚Äôt talk to me. $3#$b# Except Uncle Lew. $3#$b# And I was awful to him."/stopMusic/speak Chrissy.Seanie "$q 6799 null "#How do I tell him I‚Äôm sorry @?#$r 67 50 event_LewisTalk#Just talk to him, I‚Äôm sure that he‚Äôll understand.#$r 67 30 event_LewisSocks#Hide all his socks, until he runs out. Then he‚Äôll ask you to go to the store to buy more. And you can bond on the trip.#$r 67 10 event_LewisScream#AHHHHHHHHHHHHH"/playMusic sweet/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Even though Uncle Lew can be kind of a crumb sometimes, he‚Äôs actually really nice. $1#$b# He‚Äôs just stressed about the pressure of being the mayor. $0#$b# Which doesn‚Äôt really seem like a stressful job outside of picking up all of your wine. $7"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Thanks for talking to me today @. You really helped me out. $4#$b# I really owe you one. $1"/stopMusic/pause 1000/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Alright, if I don‚Äôt leave this forest right now, I‚Äôm going to crap my pants. $4#$b# Time to annihilate the nearest toilet! $7"/move Chrissy.Seanie 0 3 2/move Chrissy.Seanie 20 0 1 true/pause 3000/message "You also have the sudden urge to take a gigantic poop."/advancedMove farmer false 4 0 0 2 10 0/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Chrissy.Seanie "I apologized to my Uncle Lew. $0#$b# He apologized too. $1#$e# Turns out he was feeling awful about everything he said to me. $0#$b# That‚Äôs the nice thing about family, they‚Äôre always around. $1#$e# Or at least they‚Äôre supposed to be... $3"
